title: Welcome to the e-reader of आश्रमवासिक पर्व of महाभारत

intro.para: Āśramavāsika Parva or the 'Book of the Hermitage', is the fifteenth of the eighteen books of the Indian epic Mahabharata which has 47 chapters in the critical edition of Bhandarkar Oriental Research Institute(BORI). The current version follows Samsaadhanii’s latest tagging guidelines which includes कारकसम्बन्धः (kāraka relations) सन्धि-विच्छेदः (sandhi-split) and पद-विश्लेषिका (morph analyser).

The parva registers an interesting junction of duty and emotions, remorse and resentment, post- war trauma and human relations. This parva partakes of what Mahabharata aspires to be, a sketch of human life in its totality and yet in contradictions.
